content.rendered:
We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our Marine team with Paul Martin joining the London team as Director of P&I Services.

“Paul is a Master Mariner (unlimited) and former marine pilot, who joins AqualisBraemar today as part of our continued expansion. He will spearhead our growth in the P&I and Expert Witness service sectors of our marine consultancy business.” Said Mark McGurran, Group Managing Director of Marine. “Paul will start from his previous base in Singapore and relocate to London once the current situation allows. Paul brings with him a wealth of experience in marine consultancy, P&I claims, salvage and expert witness services, having held roles in maritime law and other marine consultancy firms. We are delighted to add him to our experienced, and growing, team.”

Mr Martin joins AqualisBraemar from a leading international maritime law firm and specialises in accident investigation and casualty management, having been instructed in numerous cases by marine insurers, lawyers, owners, charterers and managers and bringing a total of nearly 40 years of maritime experience to the team. 

AqualisBraemar is the world’s leading provider of marine surveying and consultancy services to the marine insurance and shipping communities. Please see this page for contact details.

excerpt.rendered: We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our Marine team with Paul Martin joining the London team as Director of P&I Services.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar continues to add to the London marine team
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our Marine team with Fena Boyle joining the London team.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar adds salvage expert to growing London team
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are delighted to announce that we have continued the process of strengthening our Marine team and service offerings to the P&I market with Jason Bennett joining the London team.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar adds to London loss adjusting team
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our London office with Mark Beleski joining the adjusting team as an Energy Loss Adjuster.

jetpack-related-posts.title: AqualisBraemar strengthens London adjusting team
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are delighted to announce that we have continued to strengthen our London office with Olivier Decombes joining the adjusting team as a Director.

jetpack-related-posts.title: OWC continues to strengthen the UK team
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We are delighted to continue to strengthen our UK team with Amy Dowdeswell joining OWC as a Senior Project Manager.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Seafarers Awareness Week
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: AqualisBraemar’s Mark McGurran, group managing director of Marine, discusses the importance of our seafarers, especially at this time, looks back on his seafaring career and reflects on the challenge of looking for a career ashore and how we at AqualisBraemar strive to be that second career for seafarers.
